    public class Faculty
extends User
implements CollegeInterface
    Faculty.java This is the faculty class that represents a faculty member at the college.

      • Faculty

        public Faculty(long id,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.lang.String firstName,
               java.lang.String lastName,
               java.lang.String emailAddress,
               java.util.Date lastAccess,
               java.util.Date enrolDate,
               boolean enabled,
               char type,
               java.lang.String code,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.lang.String office,
               int extension)
        throws InvalidUserDataException
        Parameterized constructor - creates a new faculty instance
        Parameters:
        id - The faculty's id number
        password - The faculty's password
        firstName - The faculty's first name
        lastName - The faculty's last name
        emailAddress - The faculty's email address
        lastAccess - The date the faculty last accessed the system
        enrolDate - The date the faculty member was enrolled in the system
        enabled - The enabled status of the faculty
        type - The faculty's user type
        code - The faculty's code
        description - The faculty's description
        office - The faculty's office location
        extension - The faculty's phone extension
        Throws:
        InvalidUserDataException - This exception is thrown if any of the value passed into the constructor are deemed invalid
